meanings.definition: The quality or state of being horizontal.
meanings.sent1: The horizontality of the table made it easy to place the vase on top.
meanings.sent2: The horizontality of the ocean made it appear endless.
meanings.sent3: The horizontality of the sleeping cat made it look like a fluffy pancake.
meanings.sent4: The horizontality of the road stretched out before us like a never-ending ribbon.
meanings.sent5: The horizontality of the horizon at sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The position or direction of something that is horizontal.
meanings.sent1: I adjusted the horizontality of the picture frame on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The horizontality of the beam ensured the stability of the structure.
meanings.sent3: The horizontality of the book on the shelf made it stand out among the others.
meanings.sent4: The horizontality of the field made it perfect for a game of soccer.
meanings.sent5: The horizontality of the ruler helped in drawing straight lines.
